description.en: EcoScience Lab develops biotechnology solutions using microalgae and bio-stimulants to capture CO₂, improve soil health, and support regenerative agriculture.
description.fr: EcoScience Lab develops biotechnology solutions using microalgae and bio-stimulants to capture CO₂, improve soil health, and support regenerative agriculture.
